param-doc.name: documents
param-doc.p: Documents to classify. This expression is evaluated as a list of elements from the corpus.

param-doc.name: attributes
param-doc.p: Attributes of each document. The set of attributes must be identical in training with FasttextClassifierTrain and in labeling with FasttextClassifierLabel.

param-doc.name: fasttextExecutable
param-doc.p: Path to the FastText executable (see the GitHub page for installation instructions).
